item.title: #en @ 1435381582169210883
item.description: seattle election nerds: now that the census is done, it's time to study redistricting. as you know, we are required to be 14.2% +/- 1%. our current boundary has a bust. D7 is now 123,000 people, over 16% of the population. i have an idea to rebalance it. https://t.co/y9r9gmCHAl https://t.co/ko2sVcjwpj

item.title: #en @ 1435341266682851330
item.description:

item.description:

https://t.co/mGxmDDTvRW

item.description:

item.description: "Today,10 watchdog groups sent letter to Gov Hochul..urging publish over 100 COVID datasets as open data..only 14 datasets currently available..w/64 others available in format that cannot be easily used or analyzed..groups said open data help rebuild trust in state govt..."

item.title: #en @ 1435288673399017484
item.description:
Today, ten leading watchdog groups sent a letter to Governor Hochul urging her to be fully transparent about New York State's response to COVID-19.
Our groups asked Hochul to publish over one hundred COVID-19 datasets as open data.
https://t.co/TV9QR2WbMz https://t.co/kThQxWUaa7

item.description:
